description: In this almost perfect little film, Jesse Eisenberg and Kieran Culkin play cousins who reconnect in Poland to honor the memory of their grandmother, a Holocaust survivor.
title: In 'A Real Pain,' Jewish cousins tour Poland, cracking jokes and confronting the past

description: Abortion access has long been difficult for women in the military, but the end of Roe v. Wade has made it even tougher. Some 40% now serve in states with abortion bans or expanded restrictions.
title: Faced with obstacles to abortion, military women have built their own support system

description: At a hospital in Charlotte, N.C., military doctors serve alongside civilian doctors. It’s a model some hope will improve medical care in peace — and wartime.
title: When it comes to improving U.S. health care, what 20 years of war can teach us
